text: a window cleaner who caught an armed
bank robber will pick up an award today
in recognition of his bravery James
Rowley was in Lloyds Banking Coulsdon
when 47 year old Andrew Fernandez burst
in with a fake gun CCTV shows the father
of two chasing the robber outside
chasing like the road with a fire
extinguisher afro named him when it was
on a push bike his getaway vehicle and
when I knocked him off by the time I got
to him he hit me over the head with a
crash helmet but what not me to the
ground what I hurt quite a bit and then
I turned around and I shouted to my
colleague then to stop him and he tried
to detain him and then we both give
chase and caught him and hold him until
